channel.title: Heritage Bake Shop | Fresh foods and friendly service on Heritage Bake Shoppe
channel.description: Recent content in Heritage Bake Shop | Fresh foods and friendly service on Heritage Bake Shoppe

item.title: Cinnamon Rolls
item.description: Freshly Baked Cinnamon Rolls HOME > BAKED GOODS > Cinnamon Rolls These go perfectly with your morning coffee, or any other meal or snack! Soft, moist, and topped with delicious icing and nuts if you want. Cinnamon Rolls are sold by the case of five. If you need a bulk order, let us know at least two days in advance and supply the date you need them by at checkout.

item.title: Fried Pies
item.description: Freshly Baked Fried Pies HOME > BAKED GOODS > Fried Pies Bite into these perfectly baked, fruit-filled fried pies and you'll be glad you did. Choose your flavor below. If you need a bulk order, let us know at least two days in advance and supply the date you need them by at checkout. CHOOSE YOUR STYLE Apple Cherry Chocolate Peach HOW MANY? $ 3.65 Per Case ADD TO CART

item.title: Fresh Pies
item.description: Freshly Baked and Ready To Bake Pies HOME > BAKED GOODS > Fresh Pies Are you a pie lover? We've got what you need! Choose from several different flavors, or pick from our ready to bake options. We keep them in stock for quick pickup, but if you really need to stock up, give us about two days notice, and we can make as many as you want. Select the date you need them by at checkout.

item.title: Terms and Conditions
item.description: Terms and Conditions TERMS OF USE Last updated February 22, 2021 AGREEMENT TO TERMS These Terms of Use constitute a legally binding agreement made between you, whether personally or on behalf of an entity (“you”) and Heritage Bake Shoppe ("Company", “we”, “us”, or “our”), concerning your access to and use of the heritagebakeshoppe.com website as well as any other media form, media channel, mobile website or mobile application related, linked, or otherwise connected thereto (collectively, the “Site”).

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Privacy Policy Heritage Bake Shoppe Privacy Policy This Privacy Policy describes how your personal information is collected, used, and shared when you visit or make a purchase from heritagebakeshoppe.com (the “Site”). PERSONAL INFORMATION WE COLLECT When you visit the Site, we automatically collect certain information about your device, including information about your web browser, IP address, time zone, and some of the cookies that are installed on your device. Additionally, as you browse the Site, we collect information about the individual web pages or products that you view, what websites or search terms referred you to the Site, and information about how you interact with the Site.

item.title: Form Response
item.description: Thanks! We received your form submission. We want to thank you for your interest in Heritage Bake Shoppe. We'll be in touch as soon as possible! Back to Home

item.title: Coffee
item.description: Coffee HOME > Products > Coffee Relax with a cup of our strong, smooth JavaTaza coffee. It is grown in Central America, then hand-picked and dried. In Pennsylvania, the final preparations are finished, resulting in the coffee that will make your day brighter. Coffee is not available for purchase online. Below is a list of the different flavors that we keep in stock. FLAVORS: Southern Pecan Jamaican Me Crazy

item.title: Grill Seasoning
item.description: Grill Seasonings HOME > Products > Grill Seasoning Grill to perfections with our line of Weaver's Dutch Country grill seasonings and sauces. Whether you're looking for just the right flavor for your juicy steaks, or doing chicken for supper, we have the perfect spices for you. Grill seasonings are not available for purchase online. Below is a list of the sauces and seasonings that we have. SAUCES: Bourbon Peach

item.title: Bulk Foods
item.description: Bulk Foods HOME > Products > Bulk Foods If making your own foods is what you love, then this is for you. These are the same ingredients that we use in the delicious baked goods that we sell. You can buy in bulk and save, whether you need full cases, or just parts. Bulk foods are not available for purchase online. Below is a list of some of the bulk foods and ingredients that we keep in stock.

item.title: Cookies
item.description: Freshly Baked Cookies HOME > BAKED GOODS > Cookies Fill the cookie jar with the best cookies available. They go great with milk, coffee, or almost anything. Cookies sold by the the dozen. If you need to really stock up, order at least two days in advance and provide the date you need them by at checkout. CHOOSE YOUR STYLE Chocolate Chip Molasses Crinkle Monster Soft Peanut Butter Sugar Cookies - Half Dozen HOW MANY?

item.title: Whoopie Pies
item.description: Freshly Baked Whoopie Pies HOME > BAKED GOODS > Whoopie Pies These delicious cream-filled whoopie pies will get you hooked. We have several different styles to choose from. Any flavor is a great choice! If you need a large order, order at least 2 days in advance to give us time to create them for you. CHOOSE YOUR STYLE Chocolate Pumpkin Oatmeal HOW MANY? $ 1.49 ADD TO CART

item.title: Cupcakes
item.description: Freshly Baked Cupcakes HOME > BAKED GOODS > Cupcakes From chocolate chip to coconut topped, choose your favorite style of deliciousness! Cupcakes sold by the half dozen. Choose your style or choose assortment and we'll get you some of our favorites! CHOOSE YOUR STYLE Assortment Chocolate With Chocolate Icing Chocolate With White Icing Red Velvet Vanilla Magic Cupcake HOW MANY HALF DOZEN? $ 4.99 Per Dozen ADD TO CART

item.title: Cakes
item.description: Freshly Baked Cakes HOME > BAKED GOODS > Cakes Choose a fresh, soft ready-made cake to take the hassle out of making that special meal. We keep most of these cakes on the shelf. If you order in advance, we'll make it as soon as possible. Can take up to two business days to bake large orders. CHOOSE YOUR CAKE Half of a Coconut Layered Coconut Layered Half of a Carrot Layered Carrot Layered Half of a German Chocolate Layered German Chocolate Layered Half of an Italian Cream Layered Italian Cream Layered 8x8 Chocolate Cake Mini Sugar Free Lemon Cake Mini Gluten Free Chocolate Cake HOW MANY CAKES?

item.title: Danishes
item.description: Freshly Baked Danishes HOME > BAKED GOODS > Danishes Try these fruit-filled danishes once, you'll always be coming back for more! Crafted from a fruit or chocolate filling, wrapped in a perfectly baked crust, topped by a sweet glaze. Order one as an extra side for a meal, or as many as you need for the next time your friends come around. If you really need to stock up, give us about two days notice, and we can make as many as you want.

item.title: Dinner Rolls
item.description: Freshly Baked Dinner Rolls HOME > BAKED GOODS > Dinner Rolls These soft, perfectly-crusted dinner rolls ought to be always on your menu. Especially delicious when paired with our Ozark Kitchen jams. Sold by the pack of 9. If you need several packs, it is a good idea to order two business days in advance so we can get them baked for you! HOW MANY PACKS? $ 5.99 Per Pack

item.title: Fresh Bread
item.description: Freshly Baked Bread HOME > BAKED GOODS > Fresh Bread There's nothing like a good soft loaf of home-made style bread. Choose from four different styles. Price is per loaf Keep yourself stocked up. If you're needing more than a loaf or two, order in advance and select the date needed at checkout. We'll have it ready for you by then. CHOOSE YOUR STYLE White Wheat Sourdough Italian Parmesan Mini Loaf - Banana Bread Sugar Free Banana Bread Mini Loaf - Pumpkin Bread HOW MANY LOAVES?

item.title: Deli Trays
item.description: Deli Trays HOME > Products > Deli Trays Need lunch meat for the week? Or a deli tray for the party? With an inventory of fresh, high-quality meats and cheeses, we can fill the need. Choose the size you need. Most orders will be ready for pickup within 24 hours. CHOOSE YOUR SIZE Small (Serves 8-12) Medium (Serves 15-18) Large (Serves 20-25) MEAT OPTIONS: German Balogna Roast Beef Black Forest Ham

item.title: Treble Topper
item.description: Treble Topper Sandwich HOME > SANDWICHES > Treble Topper Take it to the next level with triple meats and cheeses! Talk about a full meal full of the flavors you love, custom built for you! CHOOSE YOUR BREAD White Wheat Sourdough Italian Parmesan MEAT: Cajun Turkey Roast Beef Black Forest Ham CHEESE: Muenster Colby PepperJack ADDITIONAL INGREDIENTS: LETTUCE TOMATO DILL PICKLE ONION BANANA PEPPER JALAPENO DRESSINGS: MAYO MUSTARD RANCH HONEY MUSTARD ITALIAN SALT PEPPER Make it a meal.

item.title: Double Decker
item.description: Double Decker Sandwich HOME > SANDWICHES > Double Decker For those with an appetite! Fill up with double meat and cheese, built especially for you! CHOOSE YOUR BREAD White Wheat Sourdough Italian Parmesan MEAT: Smoked Turkey Breast Labanon Balogna CHEESE: Muenster Colby ADDITIONAL INGREDIENTS: LETTUCE TOMATO DILL PICKLE ONION BANANA PEPPER JALAPENO DRESSINGS: MAYO MUSTARD RANCH HONEY MUSTARD ITALIAN SALT PEPPER Make it a meal. Add a side and drink for $2.

item.title: Roast Beef and Cheddar
item.description: Roast Beef & Cheddar Sandwich HOME > SANDWICHES > Roast Beef and Cheddar Indulge in the flavor of Roast Beef and Cheddar Cheese. Customize it with your choice of bread and toppings, and you'll have a new favorite lunch. CHOOSE YOUR BREAD White Wheat Sourdough Italian Parmesan MEAT: Roast Beef CHEESE: Cheddar ADDITIONAL INGREDIENTS: LETTUCE TOMATO DILL PICKLE ONION BANANA PEPPER JALAPENO DRESSINGS: MAYO MUSTARD RANCH HONEY MUSTARD ITALIAN SALT PEPPER Online orders are typically ready for pickup in 15 minutes or less.

item.title: Turkey and Swiss
item.description: Turkey & Swiss Sandwich HOME > SANDWICHES > Turkey and Swiss Can't beat the delicious flavor of smoked turkey breast, swiss cheese, with fresh veggies on your choice of bread. CHOOSE YOUR BREAD White Wheat Sourdough Italian Parmesan MEAT: Smoked Turkey Breast CHEESE: Swiss ADDITIONAL INGREDIENTS: LETTUCE TOMATO DILL PICKLE ONION BANANA PEPPER JALAPENO DRESSINGS: MAYO MUSTARD RANCH HONEY MUSTARD ITALIAN SALT PEPPER Make it a meal. Add a side and drink for $2.

item.title: Balogna
item.description: Balogna Sandwich HOME > SANDWICHES > Balogna Go for the classic American Balogna sandwich! Custom made from the freshest ingredients! CHOOSE YOUR BREAD White Wheat Sourdough Italian Parmesan MEAT: German Balogna CHEESE: American ADDITIONAL INGREDIENTS: LETTUCE TOMATO DILL PICKLE ONION BANANA PEPPER JALAPENO DRESSINGS: MAYO MUSTARD RANCH HONEY MUSTARD ITALIAN SALT PEPPER Make it a meal. Add a side and drink for $2.19 Online orders are typically ready for pickup in 15 minutes or less.

item.title: Chicken or Hamburgers
item.description: Chicken or Hamburger Sandwiches HOME > SANDWICHES > Chicken or Hamburgers Fill up on a delicious grilled chicken or hamburger sandwich! Customize it to the perfect taste with toppings, cheese and more. BREAD: Homemade Hamburger Buns CHOOSE YOUR MEAT Grilled Chicken Hamburger CHOOSE YOUR CHEESE Colby PepperJack Muenster Cheddar Cojack Swiss American ADDITIONAL INGREDIENTS: LETTUCE TOMATO DILL PICKLE ONION BANANA PEPPER JALAPENO DRESSINGS: MAYO MUSTARD RANCH HONEY MUSTARD ITALIAN SALT PEPPER KETCHUP Make it a meal.

item.title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
item.description: Grilled Cheese Sandwich HOME > SANDWICHES > Grilled Cheese Sandwich Looking for a quick and delicious meal that satisfies your cheesy cravings? Try our grilled cheese sandwich - a perfect combination of melted cheese and crispy bread that will leave you wanting more. CHOOSE YOUR BREAD White Wheat Sourdough Italian Parmesan Make it a meal. Add a side and drink for $2.19 Online orders are typically ready for pickup in 15 minutes or less.

item.title: Heritage Ham
item.description: Heritage Ham Sandwich HOME > SANDWICHES > Heritage Ham Revel in the deliciousness of Black Forest Ham, Muenster Cheese, Lettuce, Tomato, Salt and Pepper. All fresh and made especially for you! CHOOSE YOUR BREAD White Wheat Sourdough Italian Parmesan MEAT: Black Forest Ham CHEESE: Muenster ADDITIONAL INGREDIENTS: LETTUCE TOMATO DILL PICKLE ONION BANANA PEPPER JALAPENO DRESSINGS: MAYO MUSTARD RANCH HONEY MUSTARD ITALIAN SALT PEPPER Make it a meal. Add a side and drink for $2.

item.title: Design-Your-Own
item.description: Design Your Own Sandwich HOME > SANDWICHES > Design-Your-Own Go for your own favorite custom taste with a sandwich made especially for you! Grab your favorite meal by choosing your bread, meats, cheeses, and add-ons. CHOOSE YOUR BREAD White Wheat Sourdough Italian Parmesan CHOOSE YOUR MEAT Roast Beef Black Forest Ham Carving Ham Turkey Breast Cajun Turkey Sweet Lebanon Balogna Balogna ADD DOUBLE MEAT? CHOOSE YOUR SECOND MEAT None Roast Beef Black Forest Ham Carving Ham Turkey Breast Cajun Turkey Sweet Lebanon Balogna Balogna ADD TRIPLE MEAT?
